full_transcript: Hello, I'm pitching GridMaster to a Tier-IV Data Center CTO. Our main value proposition is the reduction in PUE. By using our K-Logic processors and 128-point thermal nets, we can predict hotspots before they occur, reducing cooling costs by up to 32 percent. This isn't just software; it's hardware optimization for the AI age.
